content: --पूत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ‘purified by arms’, rendered pure or absolved from guilt by being killed with a weapon on the battle-field; अशस्त्रपूतं निर्व्याजं ( महामांसं) <ls>Māl. 5. 12</ls>; (see <ls>Jagaddhara</ls>'s explanation of the word); अहमपि तस्य मिथ्याप्रतिज्ञौवलक्ष्यसंपादितमशस्त्रपूतं मरणमुपदिशामि <ls>Ve. 2.</ls>
